com.client

Interface SliderListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MovieMap

    public interface SliderListener
    The listener interface for the sliders

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onChange(SliderEvent e)
      This event is triggered on slide stop, or if the value is changed programmatically (by the value method).
      boolean onSlide(SliderEvent e)
      This event is triggered on every mouse move during slide.
      void onStart(SliderEvent e)
      This event is triggered when the user starts sliding
      void onStop(SliderEvent e)
      This event is triggered when the user stops sliding.

    • Method Detail

      • onStart

        void onStart(SliderEvent e)
        This event is triggered when the user starts sliding
        Parameters:
        e - SliderEvent

      • onSlide

        boolean onSlide(SliderEvent e)
        This event is triggered on every mouse move during slide. Return false in order to prevent a slide, based on a value.
        Parameters:
        e - SliderEvent
        Returns:
        boolean false to prevent the slide

      • onChange

        void onChange(SliderEvent e)
        This event is triggered on slide stop, or if the value is changed programmatically (by the value method). Use SliderEvent.hasOriginalEvent() to detect whether the value changed by mouse or keyboard. When false it means the change was done programmatically.
        Parameters:
        e - SliderEvent

      • onStop

        void onStop(SliderEvent e)
        This event is triggered when the user stops sliding.
        Parameters:
        e - SliderEvent
